tableView

Class TableViewModelEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • tableView.TableViewModelEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TableViewModelEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    TableViewModelEvent is used to notify listeners that a table view model.
    See Also:
    javas.swing.event.TableModelEvent, Serialized Form
